title: Community Events
description: 今後6ヶ月間で、どのようにしてコミュニティへの有意義な参加を増やすことができるか？

f6_assessments.q0: I agree with this proposal being important   because  Community-driven projects like Catalyst need organized events to connect, discuss ideas, solve problems together and initiate collaboration. If people are coming together only to work, it becomes tedious and boring. People must have fun with eaceh other, let loose and interact in social situations not only on work projects. That is why big companies always have social events for teams, departments and sometimes the entire company. Parties, picnics, Day trips, Weekend seminars where the entire family comes and enjoys the hotel and facilities etc.  That way they can socialize while learning at their conference or seminar.
f6_assessments.q1: The budget for this project is reasonable
f6_assessments.q2:
The Verifiability of this is clear. Metrics would include
 Number of proposals
Quality of proposals (CA rating)
Number of successfully implemented proposals
Number of registered wallets
Amount of registered ADA
Number of votes
Community Advisors
Number of active CAs/vCAs
Number of assessments
Number of high quality assessments
Increase active participation in community events:
Number of community events
Number of participants
Diversity of participants

importance: Catalystのようなコミュニティ主導のプロジェクトには、人と人がつながり、アイデアを話し合い、一緒に問題を解決し、コラボレーションを開始するための組織的なイベントが必要です。
success: 高いエンゲージメント、協力的な問題感知、強力な実行チームを特徴とする多様なコミュニティ。
